title: Projects
description: Manage your projects or consult the archived projects.

delete.description: You're going to delete this project, this cannot be undone. If you wish to continue press the check icon.

archive.description: You're about to archive this project, this cannot be undone. If you wish to continue, press the check icon.

noProjects.active: You don't have any active projects yet. Start planning today and create one.
noProjects.archived: You don't have any archived project yet

noGoals: You don't seem to have any goals for this project. Don't wait and start to plan your success!
